lyrics:
2 contributorslove love love let you go lyricsits like

you know im always on the rise
or is this love love love love love

with smile i cant hide

no defenses im

for common sense

oh my
so delighted i
dont try
to even fight it

that i will never let you go

i wont i wont let you go

i wont i wont let you go

said i wont let you go now

is this love love love love love

with a twinkle in my eye

chorus
